Trial_Design.evidence: In a video vignette-based randomized, double-blinded study

Participants.evidence: patients with advanced cancer viewed two videos

Intervention.evidence: the surgeon uses either the BC/WC or the R/B framework to discuss treatment options

Objective.evidence: To evaluate if patients with advanced cancer prefer surgeons to use the best case/worst case (BC/WC) communication framework over the traditional risk/benefit (R/B) framework

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was patients’ preferred video surgeon

Number_Randomised.evidence: 66 were randomized and 58 completed the study

Result_Outcome.evidence: 22 patients (37.9%, 95%CI:25.4%−50.4%) preferred the surgeon using the BC/WC framework
